title: TU142: Trauma-Informed Therapy with Children, with Robyn Gobbel, MSW, RPT-S
description: Learn more about the science of trauma and what heals.  For parents and for therapists treating children and adults - Robyn Gobbel has resources to support you in addressing dysregulation and in applying the neuroscience of attachment.
itunes:subtitle: Harness the power of neuroscience to heal.  Anyone needing to manage dysregulation - theirs or others - will gain from them espisode.
itunes:summary: Attachment experts teach us how to boil down the essence of what heals humans. Learn more about trauma-informed parenting and therapy here. www.therapistuncensored.com/episodes.
itunes:author: Ann Kelley, PhD & Sue Marriott LCSW, CGP, Robyn Gobell MSW, RPT-S
itunes:title: Trauma-informed Therapy with Children, guest Robyn Gobbel
